name: Retro Pocket
synopsis: Retro Pocket is a fun and exciting video game that brings you back to the glory days of LED handhelds! Discover eight all-original LED-style games such as Kung Fu Hero, Whale Escape, Mind Your Head and more! With Game A and Game B modes in all eight games, as well as the retro-style soundtrack, UFO Interactive Games would like to welcome you (back) into the wonderful world of Retro Pocket!
